name: Two Souls Bound
description:
"Two Souls Bound" is our Global Game Jam 2022 entry.

It's a short emotional puzzle game about a girl who gets lost wondering in forgotten ruins and the ghost of her brother helping her escape.

Switch between two worlds and characters in the world of the living and the spirit world to continue your path.

Have fun & be nice :)

Move: Left Mouse Button  / Click: Right Mouse Button
